mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reports (title, content, approver_id, approver_name, complete_date, writer_id, created_date, status) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{approverId}, #{approverName}, #{completeDate}, #{writerId}, #{createdDate}, #{status} )
mapper.select: SELECT report_id AS reportId, writer_id AS writerId, title AS title, content AS content, complete_date AS completeDate, created_date AS createdDate, modified_date AS modifiedDate, approver_name AS approverName, status AS status, reject_reason AS rejectReason FROM reports WHERE report_id = #{reportId}

SELECT report_id AS reportId, writer_id AS writerId, title, created_date AS createdDate, approver_name AS approverName, status FROM reports WHERE writer_id = #{writerId} ORDER BY created_date desc LIMIT 5;
mapper.update: UPDATE reports SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, approver_id = #{approverId}, approver_name = #{approverName}, complete_date = #{completeDate}, modified_date = #{modifiedDate} WHERE report_id = #{reportId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shared_trash (original_table, original_id, deleted_date, created_date, deleted_by, content, approver_writer_id, approver_writer_name, completion_due_date, title, file_id, modified_date, status, reject_reason) SELECT 'reports', report_id, NOW(), created_date, writer_id, content, approver_id, approver_name, complete_date, title, file_id, modified_date, status, reject_reason FROM reports WHERE report_id = #{reportId}
mapper.select:
SELECT file_id AS fileId, cloud_server_file_url AS cloudServerFileUrl, original_file_name AS originalFilename, uuid_file_name AS uuidFilename, size, upload_date AS uploadDate
FROM report_files WHERE file_id = #{fileId}
